mapper.select: SELECT diary_id AS diaryID, user_id AS userId, user_sqno AS userSqno, author, title, content, tag1, tag2, tag3, emotion, diary_status AS diaryStatus, del_yn AS delYn, reg_dt AS date FROM diary where del_yn = 'N' AND (#{userId} IS NULL OR user_id = #{userId}) ORDER BY reg_dt DESC

SELECT diary_id AS diaryID, user_sqno AS userSqno, title, content, diary_status AS diaryStatus, diary_type AS diaryType, reg_dt AS regDt, updt_dt AS updtDt FROM diary WHERE del_yn = 'N'
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
ORDER BY reg_dt DESC
